Name: Cafe 't Pandje
Review Text: Really fun pub, with a good selection of drinks! The ambience is verry nice, and the central location is great! The prices are usually really good too: bear is cheap, snacks are affordable and even the stronger stuff doesn't break the bank.

Name: Cafe 't Pandje
Review Text:
Pay for water too? No thank you! Dull ! Gloomy! Rude service! Need I say more?
Update: I went quite a while ago and i was asked to pay for it! :( sad but true.

Name: Cafe 't Pandje
Review Text: Local caf√© with a patient and friendly owner, that's open until late on the weekend. Ample selection of drinks, but rather plain interior and dirty toilets.

Name: Cafe 't Pandje
Review Text: Ordered a craft beer and the beer was as good as beer can be. The setting was not for me but it has its rugged bar style.

Name: Cafe 't Pandje
Review Text: Wonderful place. really cozy and lots of people but that makes it really nice. And amazing staff and you can always meet interesting people here üòâ. . .

Name: Cafe 't Pandje
Review Text: (Translated by Google) One of the true Utrecht classics. A nice brown caf√© in a monumental building. Great whiskey, tasty specialty beers, nice music with a normal volume and above all a lot of fun until the late hours. Highly recommended! ‚Ä¶
